name: VIC High Grade Hulls Blueprint Package
desc: Enables heavy industry to construct high grade ship hulls designed by Volkov Industrial Conglomerate.

name: VIC High Grade Weapons Blueprint Package
desc: Enables heavy industry to construct high grade weapons designed by Volkov Industrial Conglomerate.

name: VIC Low Grade Hulls Blueprint Package
desc: Enables heavy industry to construct ship hulls designed by Volkov Industrial Conglomerate.

name: VIC Low Grade Weapons Blueprint Package
desc: Enables heavy industry to construct weapons designed by Volkov Industrial Conglomerate.

name: VIC Fighters Blueprint Package
desc: Enables heavy industry to construct figther wings designed by Volkov Industrial Conglomerate.

name: Transfiguration Solutions
desc:
Allows to significantly increase the resilience and productivity of agricultures and livestock, drastically modifying and reshaping them via viruses, fungi or other engineered biological agents. In-built apopthosis mechanisms make sure the transfigured organisms require regular renewal of administered solutions.

However, large-scale transfiguration also severely increases the difficulty of transportation of modified organisms, as well as their need for various additional organic nutrients.

name: Ambrosia Nectar
desc: A single sip of this heavenly-tasting spicy syrup, and one is ready to take on the Tyrant's regime with bare hands. But beware, the fall from grace is a one-way ticket.

name: Ambrosia Nectar Recipe
desc: A collection of old documents and recipes detailing the production method for a certain beverage.
